ctx: intros t l1 l2 Hcov Hperm.

exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall (A : Type) (t : btree A) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), cover l1 t -> permutation l1 l2 -> cover l2 t" on hypothesis of type "cover_min l1 t".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: Type
f: A -> nat

Goal:
forall (t : btree A) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), cover_min l1 t -> permutation l1 l2 -> cover_min l2 t

Premises:
Inductive t : nat -> Set := F1 : forall n : nat, Fin.t (S n) | FS : forall n : nat, Fin.t n -> Fin.t (S n) Arguments Fin.t _%nat_scope Arguments Fin.F1 {n}%nat_scope Arguments Fin.FS {n}%nat_scope
cover_min = fun (l : list (btree A)) (t1 : btree A) => cover l t1 /\ (forall t2 : btree A, cover l t2 -> weight_tree f t1 <= weight_tree f t2) : list (btree A) -> btree A -> Prop Arguments cover_min _%list_scope
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
Inductive btree (A : Type) : Type := leaf : A -> btree A | node : btree A -> btree A -> btree A Arguments btree _%type_scope Arguments leaf [A]%type_scope Arguments node [A]%type_scope
permutation : forall A : Type, list A -> list A -> Prop
cover_permutation : forall (A : Type) (t : btree A) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), cover l1 t -> permutation l1 l2 -> cover l2 t
weight_tree_list_permutation : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> nat) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), permutation l1 l2 -> weight_tree_list f l1 = weight_tree_list f l2
cover_inv_app_aux : forall (A : Type) (t t1 t2 : btree A) (l : list (btree A)), cover l t -> t = node t1 t2 -> l = [node t1 t2] \/ (exists l1 l2 : list (btree A), (cover l1 t1 /\ cover l2 t2) /\ permutation l (l1 ++ l2))
ordered_sum_leaves_eq : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> nat) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), permutation l1 l2 -> ordered (sum_order f) l1 -> ordered (sum_order f) l2 -> map (sum_leaves f) l1 = map (sum_leaves f) l2
cover_app : forall (A : Type) (t1 t2 : btree A) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), cover l1 t1 -> cover l2 t2 -> cover (l1 ++ l2) (node t1 t2)
permutation_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> list A -> Prop), P [] [] -> (forall (a : A) (l1 l2 : list A), permutation l2 l1 -> P l2 l1 -> P (a :: l2) (a :: l1)) -> (forall (a b : A) (l : list A), P (a :: b :: l) (b :: a :: l)) -> (forall l1 l2 l3 : list A, permutation l1 l2 -> P l1 l2 -> permutation l2 l3 -> P l2 l3 -> P l1 l3) -> forall l l0 : list A, permutation l l0 -> P l l0
permutation_sind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> list A -> SProp), P [] [] -> (forall (a : A) (l1 l2 : list A), permutation l2 l1 -> P l2 l1 -> P (a :: l2) (a :: l1)) -> (forall (a b : A) (l : list A), P (a :: b :: l) (b :: a :: l)) -> (forall l1 l2 l3 : list A, permutation l1 l2 -> P l1 l2 -> permutation l2 l3 -> P l2 l3 -> P l1 l3) -> forall l l0 : list A, permutation l l0 -> P l l0
ulist_perm : forall (A : Type) (l1 l2 : list A), permutation l1 l2 -> ulist l1 -> ulist l2
permutation_trans : forall (A : Type) (l1 l2 l3 : list A), permutation l1 l2 -> permutation l2 l3 -> permutation l1 l3
cover_inv_app : forall (A : Type) (t1 t2 : btree A) (l : list (btree A)), cover l (node t1 t2) -> l = [node t1 t2] \/ (exists l1 l2 : list (btree A), (cover l1 t1 /\ cover l2 t2) /\ permutation l (l1 ++ l2))
all_permutations_aux_permutation : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (l1 l2 : list A), n = length l2 -> In l1 (all_permutations_aux A l2 n) -> permutation l1 l2
permutation_all_permutations_aux : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (l1 l2 : list A), n = length l2 -> permutation l1 l2 -> In l1 (all_permutations_aux A l2 n)
unique_key_perm : forall (A B : Type) (l1 l2 : list (A * B)), permutation l1 l2 -> unique_key l1 -> unique_key l2
permutation_one_inv_aux : forall (A : Type) (l1 l2 : list A), permutation l1 l2 -> forall a : A, l1 = [a] -> l2 = [a]
permutation_all_permutations : forall (A : Type) (l1 l2 : list A), permutation l1 l2 -> In l1 (all_permutations l2)
all_permutations_permutation : forall (A : Type) (l1 l2 : list A), In l1 (all_permutations l2) -> permutation l1 l2
permutation_map_ex_aux : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (l1 l2 : list B) (l3 : list A), permutation l1 l2 -> l1 = map f l3 -> exists l4 : list A, permutation l4 l3 /\ l2 = map f l4
ulist_app : forall (A : Type) (l1 l2 : list A), ulist l1 -> ulist l2 -> (forall a : A, In a l1 -> In a l2 -> False) -> ulist (l1 ++ l2)
Inductive cover (A : Type) : list (btree A) -> btree A -> Prop := cover_one : forall t : btree A, cover [t] t | cover_node : forall (l1 l2 : list (btree A)) (t1 t2 t3 : btree A), permutation l1 (t1 :: t2 :: l2) -> cover (node t1 t2 :: l2) t3 -> cover l1 t3 Arguments cover [A]%type_scope _%list_scope Arguments cover_one _%type_scope Arguments cover_node _%type_scope (_ _)%list_scope
cover_sind : forall (A : Type) (P : list (btree A) -> btree A -> SProp), (forall t : btree A, P [t] t) -> (forall (l1 l2 : list (btree A)) (t1 t2 t3 : btree A), permutation l1 (t1 :: t2 :: l2) -> cover (node t1 t2 :: l2) t3 -> P (node t1 t2 :: l2) t3 -> P l1 t3) -> forall (l : list (btree A)) (b : btree A), cover l b -> P l b
cover_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list (btree A) -> btree A -> Prop), (forall t : btree A, P [t] t) -> (forall (l1 l2 : list (btree A)) (t1 t2 t3 : btree A), permutation l1 (t1 :: t2 :: l2) -> cover (node t1 t2 :: l2) t3 -> P (node t1 t2 :: l2) t3 -> P l1 t3) -> forall (l : list (btree A)) (b : btree A), cover l b -> P l b
permutation_flat_map : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> list B) (l1 l2 : list A), permutation l1 l2 -> permutation (flat_map f l1) (flat_map f l2)
permutation_app_comp : forall (A : Type) (l1 l2 l3 l4 : list A), permutation l1 l2 -> permutation l3 l4 -> permutation (l1 ++ l3) (l2 ++ l4)
permutation_inv : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (l1 l2 : list A), permutation (a :: l1) (a :: l2) -> permutation l1 l2
permutation_skip : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (l1 l2 : list A), permutation l2 l1 -> permutation (a :: l2) (a :: l1)

```coq
intros t l1 l2 Hcov Hperm.
apply cover_permutation with (l1 := l1) (l2 := l2) in Hcov; auto.
Qed.```
